hero.title: I'M ARTHIT LUNGYA
hero.description1: A passionate Full Stack Developer with expertise in both frontend and backend technologies. I craft complete web solutions from database design to user interfaces. Check out my
hero.description2: to see how I transform complex requirements into elegant, scalable applications.
hero.description3: When I'm not architecting systems or writing code, I'm exploring new technologies and reading tech
hero.description4: to stay ahead in the ever-evolving tech landscape. I believe in clean code, robust architecture, and continuous learning. Looking for a developer who can handle everything from server configuration to pixel-perfect UI?
